channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio Website for Disha
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Portfolio Website for Disha

item.title: campaign
item.description: ## Rows: 1,292,843 ## Columns: 4 ## $ cand_nm <chr> "Clinton, Hillary Rodham", "Clinton, Hillary Rodh... ## $ contb_receipt_amt <dbl> 50.00, 200.00, 5.00, 48.33, 40.00, 244.34, 35.00,... ## $ zip <dbl> 94939, 93428, 92337, 95334, 93011, 95826, 90278, ... ## $ contb_date <date> 2016-04-26, 2016-04-20, 2016-04-02, 2016-11-21, ... # Top 10 Candidates with highest Contribution total_contrb<-CA_contributors_2016 %>% group_by(cand_nm) %>% summarise(Total_contb=sum(contb_receipt_amt)) %>% arrange(desc(Total_contb)) %>% mutate(highlight_clinton = ifelse(cand_nm == 'Clinton, Hillary Rodham', T, F)) %>% ggplot(top_10_candidates,mapping=aes(x=Total_contb/10^6, y=reorder(cand_nm,Total_contb))) + geom_col(aes(fill=highlight_clinton)) + labs(title= "Candidates with highest contribution", x= "Total Contribution in million $", y="")+ theme_classic()+ scale_fill_manual(values = c('#595959', 'blue'))+ theme(legend.

item.title: Ipsum
item.description: Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt vivamus et sagittis magna sed nunc rhoncus condimentum sem. In efficitur ligula tate urna. Maecenas massa sed magna lacinia magna pellentesque lorem ipsum dolor. Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt. Vivamus et sagittis tempus.
